task.title: Check Transcriptions
task.shortdesc: Check sessions for phone transcription errors.

step.cmd: Select the Project Check Transcriptions... menu item.
step.stepresult: This will open the Check Transcriptions window.

step.cmd: Select the Check IPA Tiers option.
Select the project, corpora, or sessions whose transcriptions you wish to check, and click Next.
step.stepresult: Phon will check each selected session, and any phone transcription errors will be printed in red, with their corpus, session, record number, and tier (IPA Target or IPA Actual).To resolve a reported error, return to the Project Manager window and open the session in which the error occurred, then navigate to the relevant record and visually check its IPA tiers.
